version_description:
Dear gamers! We updated our favorite game:
- game stability improvements have been made and game bugs have been fixed;
- amount of problems with caravans and the market have been fixed;
- trading with people has become even simplier: most of issues with the ship have been fixed. Have fun and play with your friends;
- tutorial for new players (in the beginning of the game) is more interesting and easier now!

Play with pleasure!

What’s new in the update:
· Convenient system for making new friends even without social network login.
· Ability to request help from players for any goods at any time.
· New production buildings with various resources to produce plenty of new goods.
· New gameplay loop to earn Relicts (special rare resources)
· User Interface graphical redesign
· Option to invite real world friend by imessage and email.
· Faster level progress starting from level 33.
· Bugfix
